data.text:
@clacke @ianbremmer Information of the Mexican case, it is in Spanish of course, the graphs were made with the information of the health department.

https://t.co/TuBgv9mS0s

@curtispat80 @ianbremmer They worked on previous strains, we had outbursts that were subdued.

With Omicron's higher virulence and shorter incubation it only had to jump out of the ward once and weeks later we're still exponential.
@Valk6 @ianbremmer This is news to me, do you have a source?
@tiagopantaleao @ianbremmer They do, all of this is because there is elderly people not vaccinated, and they dropped all measures.
@zagreus39922475 @ianbremmer There were other measures in place, which were removed because “omicron is milder”.
@curtispat80 @clacke @ianbremmer They did, until they were lifted without vaccinating everyone.
@clacke @ianbremmer Omicron is not milder in unvaccinated population, on the contrary, it is the most lethal so far.
@clacke @ianbremmer Another way of saying, lockdowns and mandates didn't ultimately work to protect?
